To those asking about all the "rars" no Its not because it takes less time when downloading.

When you upload/download a file, especially a large file there's a chance that the file 'misses' something or in other words, creates an error and makes you have to re-download.

When you instead rar the file in the way that is done here, that chance of the file creating said error and not working correctly or at all, nearly vanishes.

@Lucias: Each .rar file will point to the correct next-in-line-file while extracting, you don't need to extract more then one of the .rars because each .rar holds a separate portion of the data, simply right click any of the files and extract it like you would any other .rar file.

For everyone who isn't sure what to do with this download!

1. This torrent is filled with an assortment of .rar files. Programs like WinRAR will work wonders with opening and extracting the information.

2. Inside of the .rars are all of the game files you need. There is no installation process, you are pretty much just downloading the straight and pure game in condensed .rar form.

3. Make a new folder named Bioshock 3 (or whatever else you want to call it) then open this download and start with "Bioshock Infinite STEAM UNLOCKED.part001". You are going to extract ALL of the files in there to your new Bioshock 3 (or other-ly named) folder.

4. From this point you are going to download the crack from here: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8300453/BioShock_Infinite_Crack_Only-FLT

5. Replace the Binaries folder from the base game with the Fairlight crack torrent. Your game is now cracked and playable!


**** IF YOU USED THE ALI123 CRACK!!***

If you used the ALI123 crack, you CANNOT use this one. You need to re-download, or re-extract, or whatever to get these original base files and overwrite them with Fairlight's crack instead. If you try and mix Fairlight's crack with ALI123's crack the game will not function.

I had difficulties getting this to work, but I have finally figured out what was going wrong. Here's a step-by-step process to make this work.

After downloading the torrent, you're going to be presented with many .rar files, some links and documents.
Open 7-Zip (this is what I used, other programs like Winzip should work), select all of the .rar files, and extract them to a folder ON YOUR DESKTOP.
I tried this many times extracting to a Documents folder, then to Program Files, nothing worked. It may work in other locations, I can't say whether or not, but the game will work from Desktop.

Download your crack. I used the Bioshock Infinite Crack Only-FTL one available here. Open the folder, open Binaries, open Win32. Highlight the BioshockInfinite .exe and the steam_api.dll, right click, select Copy.

Now open the folder on your desktop that you extracted the files to. Open Binaries, right click on Win32, and select Paste. It will prompt you whether you want to overwrite the two files, select yes to both.

After this, double clicking the .exe opens the game right up, and it plays flawlessly. No gameplay issues or crashes, no saving issues.
